name: Team1-Kû
description:
Control Kû, a small creature of the void sorry to see his world unbalanced and having lost its colours.

Go and find the elements requested by the Spirits of Nature to restore the balance!
Jump on platforms, consume the elements and see who needs which element.

Consuming food bonus items  will increase your abilities for the stage.

French fries : Running speed 
Mochi: Jumping force
Waffle: Climb speed

So... choose wisely which food bonus item you will need to consume in each stage !

This game was created in the context of the Game Jam "Balance".
